name: Superset
description: This Test Connection validates the access against the server and basic metadata extraction of dashboards and charts.

steps.name: CheckAccess
steps.description: Validate that the API or DB is accessible with the given credentials
steps.errorMessage: Failed to connect to superset, please validate the credentials

steps.name: GetDashboards
steps.description: List all the dashboards available to the user
steps.errorMessage: Failed to fetch dashboards, please validate if user has access to fetch dashboards

steps.name: GetCharts
steps.description: List all the charts available to the user
steps.errorMessage: Failed to fetch charts, please validate if user has access to fetch charts
